prompts: Create a playful monkey Pokemon with purple fur and a long tail.
Generate a small Normal-type Pokemon that loves to climb trees and swing.
Imagine a whimsical creature that has a mischievous smile and a fluffy tail.
Design a cute Pokemon that can be found in urban areas and forests.
Show me a Pokemon with large ears and a distinctive hand feature.
Make a character inspired by Aipom, focusing on agility and charm.
I want a Pokemon that embodies playfulness and is always ready for fun.

distinctive_features: Fluffy tuft of hair on head
